rule_text: Attained_Age <= 78.5 AND Attained_Age > 69.5 AND Smoker_Status <= 0.5 AND Duration > 20.5 AND Attained_Age <= 74.5 AND Attained_Age > 72.5

interpretation.risk: Mortality is 1.89x the population average (89.0% higher).
